description: News site Bellingcat unveils evidence implicating a Russian unit in the case of the Putin critic.
title: Alexei Navalny: Report names 'Russian agents' in poisoning case
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Report names 'Russian agents' in poisoning case - BBC News
maintext: Moreover, investigators show that there may have been earlier attempts to poison him. His wife Yuliya fell ill when the pair were on a romantic trip to the city of Kaliningrad in July, suddenly finding it "nearly impossible to stand up" and only recovering the next morning.
